thread.title: Proposed MLK tribute on Georgia's Stone Mountain faces backlash

title: Proposed MLK tribute on Georgia's Stone Mountain faces backlash
text:
Published By: CBS News: U.S. - Today 
A plan to celebrate King involves building a tribute in the same area as America's biggest shrine to the Confederacy...
